Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 22 Ajjhattārammaṇattika » 22.1 Paṭiccavāra » 22.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 22.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Ajjhattārammaṇattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
1.
2871Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhattārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
2872Bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
